AND I'M SORRY BUT IT'S VERY DANGEROUS DRIVING WITHOUT POWER STEERING.  SO DOES THIS MEAN EVERY 3 YEARS I'M GOING TO HAVE TO PAY 700 HUNDRED DOLLARS TO HAVE IT FIXED.
